dailyCheckIn.title: Daily Check-In
dailyCheckIn.subtitle: A glance at how your body and mind feel

dailyCopilot.title: What to do today
dailyCopilot.subtitle: Your daily insight, tailored for you.

scoreModal.title: How is the score calculated?
scoreModal.description: The overall score (0-100) is calculated by combining different factors of your daily well-being. Each factor contributes with a specific weight to the final score.
scoreModal.moodDesc: Based on your daily mood check-in (scale 1-5). Contributes 20% to the total score.
scoreModal.sleepDesc: Combination of sleep hours (70%) and sleep quality (30%). Contributes 30% to the total score.
scoreModal.stepsDesc: Based on the number of daily steps compared to the goal of 10,000 steps. Contributes 20% to the total score.
scoreModal.hrvDesc: Measures heart rate variability, an indicator of recovery and stress. Contributes 15% to the total score.
scoreModal.hydrationDesc: Based on the number of glasses of water consumed compared to the goal of 8 glasses. Contributes 15% to the total score.

card.sampleHint: Complete your first emotion analysis to see real results

sessionCard.valenceWhyItMatters: Measures the positivity/negativity of your emotional state.
sessionCard.arousalWhyItMatters: Indicates how much activation/emotional energy there is at this moment.
sessionCard.arousalHowItWorks: Assessment of the intensity of expressive signals.

hero.title: Real-time Emotion Detection
hero.subtitle: Capture a quick scan to understand how you feel and track mood trends.

trends.title: Emotional Trends
trends.subtitle: 7-day overview of your emotional state
trends.noData: No data available for this period
trends.emptyState: Start recording sessions to see your emotional trends

metrics.valenceDesc: Tracks the positivity of your expression and overall affect.
metrics.arousalDesc: Measures the intensity or energy level detected at the moment.
metrics.valenceDescription: Valence measures how positive or negative your emotions are. High values indicate happiness and satisfaction, while low values indicate sadness or worry. This metric helps you understand your overall emotional state.
metrics.arousalDescription: Arousal measures the intensity of your emotions, regardless of whether they are positive or negative. High values indicate excitement or stress, while low values indicate calm or relaxation. It helps you understand your level of emotional activation.
metrics.sessionsDescription: The number of emotion analysis sessions you have completed this month. Regularly tracking your emotions helps you better understand your emotional patterns and overall well-being.

camera.instructionText: Align your face within the camera frame to begin emotion detection

detailedAnalysis.buttonText: Get more details about your analysis

insights.lockedDescription: Smart insights are generated only after you complete a new emotion analysis on the current day.

results.title: Emotion Analysis Complete
results.subtitle: Here's what we detected about your emotional state

joy.title: Joyful
joy.advice: Great! Your positive mood is wonderful. Consider sharing this joy with others or engaging in activities that amplify this feeling.

sadness.title: Melancholy
sadness.description: It's okay to feel this way sometimes.
sadness.advice: It's okay to feel sad sometimes. Try gentle activities like listening to music, talking to a friend, or taking a peaceful walk.

anger.title: Frustrated
anger.description: Anger is a natural response to challenges.
anger.advice: Anger is a natural emotion. Try deep breathing exercises, counting to ten, or engaging in physical activity to release tension.

fear.title: Concerned
fear.description: Fear can be overwhelming but manageable.
fear.advice: Fear can be overwhelming. Practice grounding techniques like focusing on your breathing or identifying things you can control.

surprise.title: Surprised
surprise.description: Something unexpected has caught your attention.
surprise.advice: Surprise can be exciting or unsettling. Take a moment to process what happened and decide how you'd like to respond.

disgust.title: Displeased
disgust.description: Something doesn't align with your values.
disgust.advice: Disgust often signals something doesn't align with your values. Consider what's causing this feeling and how to address it.

neutral.title: Balanced
neutral.description: You're in a calm, centered state.
neutral.advice: A neutral mood is perfectly fine. This calm state is ideal for reflection or engaging in routine activities mindfully.

results.noTips: No tips available at the moment

card.sampleHint: Complete your first skin analysis to see real results

overall.label: Skin Health
overall.how: Combination of smoothness, redness, hydration and oiliness.

smoothness.title: Texture Improvement Guide
smoothness.description: Personalized tips for smoother, more even skin.

redness.title: Inflammation Reduction Guide
redness.description: Learn how to calm irritated and sensitive skin.

oiliness.title: Sebum Balance Guide
oiliness.description: Control excess oil production with expert tips.

confidence.title: Analysis Quality Tips
confidence.description: Get the most accurate skin analysis results.

hero.title: Advanced Skin Analysis
hero.subtitle: Measure hydration, redness and texture with a guided camera scan.

trends.title: Skin Health Score Trends
trends.subtitle: 7-day overview of your skin metrics
trends.detailedView: Dive deeper into your skin trends
trends.noData: Run an analysis to see your skin trends
trends.emptyState: Start a skin analysis to visualize your chart

metrics.textureDescription: Shows skin surface uniformity. Helps identify dryness, roughness, or damage. High values indicate smooth, healthy skin, while low values may indicate dryness, irregularities, or damage. Good texture is essential for a youthful and healthy appearance.
metrics.rednessDescription: Measures skin irritation and inflammation. Low values indicate calm, healthy skin, while high values may indicate inflammation, sensitivity, or conditions like rosacea. Monitoring this value helps identify irritating triggers.
metrics.hydrationDescription: Shows surface water content. Helps prevent dryness and signs of fatigue. High values indicate well-hydrated and elastic skin, while low values indicate dryness and dehydration. Good hydration is essential for maintaining soft, elastic skin resistant to wrinkles.
metrics.oilinessDescription: Measures sebaceous activity and oil production. Helps balance skincare routine. High values indicate oily skin, while low values indicate dry skin. Balanced oiliness is essential for healthy skin barrier.

camera.instructionText: Keep a steady, even light on your face for best accuracy

quality.message: Analysis quality is good. Results are reliable.

detailedAnalysis.buttonText: Get more details about your analysis

insights.lockedDescription: Skin insights are generated only after you run a new skin analysis on the current day.

results.title: Skin Analysis Complete
results.subtitle: Comprehensive AI-powered skin health assessment
results.excellentDesc: Your skin is in great condition!
results.goodDesc: Your skin is healthy with room for improvement.
results.fairDesc: Your skin needs some attention and care.
results.needsCareDesc: Your skin requires focused skincare routine.
results.imageAnalysisDesc: High-resolution skin texture and color analysis
results.tip1: Always use SPF 30+ sunscreen, even on cloudy days
results.tip2: Drink 8-10 glasses of water daily for optimal hydration
results.tip3: Get 7-9 hours of quality sleep for skin regeneration
results.tip4: Eat antioxidant-rich foods like berries and leafy greens

hero.title: Advanced Nutrition Analysis
hero.subtitle: Identify foods and calculate nutrients with a photo of your meal.

calorieHistory.title: Calorie History
calorieHistory.tipWeightLoss: Maintain a slight calorie deficit to lose weight sustainably.
calorieHistory.tipBulk: Ensure you're in a slight surplus with enough protein to build muscle.
calorieHistory.tipMaintenance: Great job maintaining your calorie balance!

card.sampleHint: Perform an analysis to see your nutrition data here

calories.why: Calories provide the energy your body needs. Monitoring them helps maintain energy balance.
calories.how: Calories are calculated based on macronutrients identified in the meal. Each gram of carbohydrates and proteins provides 4 kcal, while fats provide 9 kcal per gram.

carbohydrates.why: Carbohydrates are the body's primary energy source. They help maintain brain and muscle function.
carbohydrates.how: Carbohydrates are identified based on foods present in the meal. They're found in grains, fruits, vegetables, and legumes.

proteins.why: Proteins are essential for building and repairing muscle tissue. They also help maintain muscle mass.
proteins.how: Proteins are calculated based on protein-rich foods identified in the meal, such as meat, fish, eggs, and legumes.

fats.why: Fats are important for absorbing fat-soluble vitamins and provide energy. They help maintain cell health.
fats.how: Fats are identified based on fatty foods present in the meal, such as oils, nuts, avocado, and dairy products.

healthScore.why: The health score evaluates the overall nutritional quality of the meal. It helps make healthier food choices.
healthScore.how: The score is calculated based on macronutrient balance, presence of vitamins and minerals, and food variety.

quickStats.title: Nutritional Overview
quickStats.subtitle: Key nutritional metrics from your analysis

howItWorks.title: How Food Analysis Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how our AI analyzes your meals

microphone.benefit2: Voice commands to navigate the app

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your WellnessCoach account
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account
auth.operationError: An error occurred during the operation
auth.emailConfirmationErrorMessage: An error occurred while confirming your email. Please try again later.
auth.verifyEmailRequiredMessage:
To access all app features, you need to confirm your email.

We've sent a confirmation email to:
auth.verifyEmailRequiredCloseMessage: To use the app, you must confirm your email. Check your inbox and click the confirmation link.
auth.verifyEmailStep2: Click the confirmation link in the email
auth.verifyEmailStep3: Return to the app and click "I verified"
auth.verifyEmailNote: Note: After verifying your email, you'll be able to access all app features.
auth.emailResentMessage: We've sent a new confirmation email. Check your inbox.
auth.emailResendErrorMessage: Unable to send confirmation email. Please try again later.
auth.emailNotVerifiedMessage: The email has not been verified yet. Check your inbox and click the confirmation link.
auth.emailCheckError: Unable to check email status. Please try again later.
auth.emailCheckErrorRetry: An error occurred. Try closing and reopening the app, then click "I verified" again.
auth.emailVerifiedMessage: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now access all app features.
auth.pleaseWait: We're verifying your email. Please wait a moment.
auth.emailConfirmedSuccess: Your email has been confirmed successfully. You can continue with the tutorial!
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Click the confirmation link in your email to continue.
auth.emailVerifiedSuccessMessage: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now access all app features.
auth.emailVerifiedSuccessMessageWithName: Welcome ${name}! Your account is now active.
auth.emailVerifiedSuccessMessageWithNameFemal: Welcome ${name}! Your account is now active.

activityLevels.extremelyActive: Extremely Active (very hard exercise, physical job)

sleep.title: Restful Sleep
sleep.subtitle: How rested do you feel?
sleep.notesPlaceholder: How did you feel when you woke up?

widgetSelection.allAdded: All available widgets have already been added!
widgetSelection.disableToReAdd: Disable a widget to re-add it here.

chartSelection.disableToReAdd: Disable a chart from the main screen to re-add it.

wellnessSuggestions.title: Wellness Suggestions
wellnessSuggestions.subtitle: Explore routines curated by your AI coach to support mood, sleep, and skin health

breathingExercises.title: Breathing Exercises
breathingExercises.description: Practice mindful breathing to reduce stress and regain focus

takeAWalk.title: Take a Walk
takeAWalk.description: Enjoy a brisk walk outdoors to boost mood and circulation

stretching.title: Gentle Stretching
stretching.description: Release tension with gentle stretches for your neck and shoulders

yogaFlow.title: Yoga Flow
yogaFlow.description: Connect mind and body with a gentle yoga sequence

hydration.title: Hydration
hydration.description: Sip water steadily throughout the day to keep skin luminous

healthySnack.title: Healthy Snack
healthySnack.description: Choose nutrient-rich snacks like nuts or fresh fruit

greenTea.title: Green Tea Break
greenTea.description: Enjoy antioxidant-rich green tea for a calming moment

eveningRoutine.title: Evening Routine
eveningRoutine.description: Dim the lights and avoid screens 60 minutes before bedtime

progressiveRelaxation.title: Progressive Relaxation
progressiveRelaxation.description: Tense and release each muscle group for deep relaxation

sleepMeditation.title: Sleep Meditation
sleepMeditation.description: Guided meditation to prepare your mind for restful sleep

mindfulnessMeditation.title: Mindfulness Meditation
mindfulnessMeditation.description: Focus on the present moment with guided mindfulness practice

gratitudePractice.title: Gratitude Practice
gratitudePractice.description: Reflect on three things you're grateful for today

bodyScan.title: Body Scan
bodyScan.description: Bring awareness to each part of your body for relaxation

morningEnergy.title: Morning Energy Boost
morningEnergy.description: Start your day with energizing movements and positive affirmations

powerBreathing.title: Power Breathing
powerBreathing.description: Energizing breathing exercises to boost alertness and focus

danceBreak.title: Dance Break
danceBreak.description: Move your body to your favorite music for an instant energy boost

natureBreak.title: Take a Nature Break
natureBreak.description: Spending 20 minutes in a park or green space can significantly reduce stress hormones

deepBreathing.title: Deep Breathing Exercise
deepBreathing.description: Try 4-7-8 breathing: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 5 times

hydrationCheck.title: Hydration Check
hydrationCheck.description: Dehydration can worsen stress. Drink a glass of water with lemon to refresh

gentleCleansing.title: Gentle Cleansing
gentleCleansing.description: Use a pH-balanced cleanser twice daily to maintain healthy skin barrier

sunProtection.title: Sun Protection
sunProtection.description: Apply SPF 30+ sunscreen daily, even on cloudy days

consistentSchedule.title: Consistent Schedule
consistentSchedule.description: Go to bed and wake up at the same time every day, even on weekends

screenFreeHour.title: Screen-Free Hour
screenFreeHour.description: Avoid screens 1 hour before bedtime to improve sleep quality
